chemicals.description: Polyacrylamide (PAM) for water treatment, flocculation, and sludge dewatering. Effective in clarifying water and improving solid-liquid separation.
Xanthan gum, a natural polysaccharide used as a thickening agent, stabilizer, and emulsifier in food, pharmaceutical, and industrial applications.
Ferric chloride solution for water and wastewater treatment. Acts as a coagulant and flocculant to remove impurities and suspended solids.
Hydrated lime (calcium hydroxide) for various industrial applications, including water treatment, construction, and agriculture. Used for pH adjustment and neutralization.
Quicklime (calcium oxide) for industrial applications, including steel production, construction, and water treatment. Known for its high reactivity and alkalinity.
Sodium permanganate for water treatment and oxidation processes. Effective in removing iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide from water.
Unconcentrated softener for textile and laundry applications. Provides softness and improves the feel of fabrics.
